info.name: CodeRed - Partner APIs
info.description:
The CodeRed partner APIs are used primarily by partners who wish to integrate their platforms with CodeRed. These APIs will be let partners create/update users (which facilitates Single-Sign on) as well as view courses dynamically in their own native platforms.

Please note that partners will need a Client secret key and a Client authentication ID to be able to use the APIs. These keys will be provided by the CodeRed Team prior to the agreement with the partner.

item.name: Users
User management

formdata.description: enter source name ex: GlobalKnowledge - your company name and make sure this name will be always static
client_id will be provided via codered

request.description: This will let you create a new user in the CodeRed Database.

response.name: Validation response

formdata.description: enter source name ex: GlobalKnowledge
enter source name ex: GlobalKnowledge

request.description: This request will let you update user's profile via his access token.

response.name: Server validation

request.description: Get user's profile information for a particular user from CodeRed.

item.description: Through the following APIs, you can create users, update their profiles, or get their profile information via their access token.

item.name: Subscription

formdata.description: id package that's provide by Codered that's trigger package that will be assigned to current user

- subscription id is field use for saveral needs
1) use subscription_id to renew user's subscriptions
2) you can use subscription_id to track your users subscriptions in our database
3) recommended name conventien '{brandname}-{uuid}' 
- ex 'codered-8257341d-3227-4a35-b3af-f04d3c00da55'

request.description:
Create a new subscription or update current subscription using subscription id.

Please note that the CodeRed Team will share a package ID for the partner based on the agreement.

formdata.description: id package that's provide by Codered that's trigger package that will be assigned to current user

item.description: The Subscription APIs allow you to add or renew subscriptions for your users on CodeRed.

request.description:
Create a new subscription or update current subscription using subscription id.

Please note that the CodeRed Team will share a package ID for the partner based on the agreement.

            {
                "id": "742a26f9-3265-4b15-8be1-cd083b7ab21d",
                "name": "The Beginners 2020 Cyber Security Awareness Training Course - to be deleted",
                "brief": "WHAT YOU WILL LEARN\r\n·         You will be trained, on all the ways hackers can socially engineer you, at your work or home, through email, SMS text, phone calls, browsing, downloaded files, mobile phones, etc\r\n·         You will stop successful social engineering attacks, by spotting red flags in phishing emails, text messages and phone calls\r\n·         You will be well versed on how to securely use Windows, Apple Macs, iPhones, Androids etc\r\n·         You will be shown proven and effective cyber security software to keep your systems private and secure\r\n·         You will feel safe, secure, and private on the Internet\r\n·         You will know the common human emotions that hackers like to trigger, to trick you into giving them access to your money, personal accounts, systems and company network\r\n·         Learn how to securely configure your browser to block malicious scripts, cookies, trackers etc. as well as maintain good privacy/anonymity on the Internet\r\n·         You will be visually guided on how to effectively and efficiently manage all your passwords\r\n \r\n·         You will confidently manage your emails, business files, computers, mobile devices and Internet browsing",

request.description:
Create a new subscription or update current subscription using subscription id.

Please note that the CodeRed Team will share a package ID for the partner based on the agreement.

response.name: Get Success response

formdata.description: use client id that's provide via codered
use secret key that's provide via codered
user's username
user's password

scopes:
'update_subscriptions'=> "Ability to update user's subscriptions"
'revoke_subscriptions'  => "Ability to cancel user's subscriptions immediately ",
-- saperate between scopes by space ' '

request.description: The "get access token" is a primary API that will help you to control your users' profiles. This token will also be used to update their profile, subscriptions, level of access, etc.

formdata.description: use client id that's provide via codered
use secret key that's provide via codered
user's username
user's password

scopes:
'update_subscriptions'=> "Ability to update user's subscriptions"
'revoke_subscriptions'  => "Ability to cancel user's subscriptions immediately ",
-- saperate between scopes by space ' '

item.description: The following APIs are used to manage users, their profiles, and subscriptions. They are used to generate access tokens for specific users.

item.name: Courses

request.description: This API will get all courses paginated from CodeRed database.

response.name: Success response

request.description: This API will get all courses paginated from CodeRed database.

response.name: Success Response

item.description: The Courses APIs will allow partners to get and view all courses and their details from CodeRed with the purpose of displaying them in the partner's native platform.
